GeneDef.label: Cognitive Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically prevents conscisness from passing 60%, but makes it take a whole lot more to even begin to drop it. This allows them to survive almost complete brain destruction

GeneDef.label: Movement Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizes movment, keeping it at a maximum of 30%, allowing even the almost-legless some mobility.

GeneDef.label: Manipulation Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies manipulation, preventing it from passing 30%, but makeing it so even major injurys (such as loosing 1 arm, and almost all of the other) doesn't completly stop their manipulation capabilities!

GeneDef.label: Communication Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies talking, by keeping it at 30%. Not very good for communication, but better than nothing

GeneDef.label: Eating Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies eating, which makes it harder to eat in general, but makes it almost impossible to make them incapable of eating!

GeneDef.label: Visual Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies sight, allowing them to see no matter the injury, at the cost of realitivly impaired sight

GeneDef.label: Auditory Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies hearing, allowing them to maintain hearing even with extreme injury, at the cost of realitivly imaired hearing.

GeneDef.label: Respiratory Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically breathing, making it very hard to drop bellow 60%. While that low value is pretty negative, it is more than made up for in resistance to injuries!

GeneDef.label: Blood Filtration Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically blood filtration. While being limited to 60% does make you a bit more sensitive to diseases, the fact that severe injury won't have an effect on the filtration will assist if you have to, say, remove a kidney!

GeneDef.label: Cardiac Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies the heart, meaning that, so long as just a fragment of the heart remains, it works! if they loose it completley though...

GeneDef.label: Digestive Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizes digestion, making it harder to digest food, but where almost no injury will impeede it!

GeneDef.label: Complete Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one stabalizes everything, utilizing archites. As you can imagine, such pawns are quite weaker than others, but can take a lot of injury before any ill effects!
